hanzi-su-wiki:
肪

Значения

Жир

Мнемоника

Жировая прослойка, обращённая сторону 方 мяса 月, т.е. покрывающая мышцы.
purpleculture_pinyin:
fáng
animal fat
животный жир
rtega_mnemonic:
肪肪RSobese, fat
  • flesh 月 ready to go in the direction 方 of the slaughterhouse: sufficiently fattened up
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 方 indicates the sound; ⺼ (meat) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
脂肪 [ zhī fáng ]: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)
脂肪酸 [ zhī fáng suān ]: fatty acid
脂肪肝 [ zhī fáng gān ]: fatty liver
不饱和脂肪酸 [ bù bǎo hé zhī fáng suān ]: unsaturated fatty acid
反式脂肪 [ fǎn shì zhī fáng ]: trans fat; trans-isomer fatty acid
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • ⺼ meat, flesh; organic compound
    • 方 [ fāng ] square, rectangle; side; region; flag
heisig_constituent: obese, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, compass, direction
heisig_story: If you eat too much, you may need a compass to find your way around the obese mass of flesh that piles up in the midsection. Compare this with your stories for round (Frame 44) and fat (Frame 494), similar in meaning but distinct in imagery.
koohiiStory2: Yo momma so obese, she changed the direction of the moon.
jp_example_words: 脂肪(しぼう): fat, grease, blubber
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When the moon faces the right direction, everyone on earth becomes obese. The pull of the moon moves all the water on earth as well as inside us, so when it faces the right way, we all get super fat.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the moon turning to face a different direction. Feel your body start to become really obese. You get huge and round just like the moon.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You look around and everyone is obese like you. You try to reach out to them, but you roll over like a big bowling (ぼう) ball. The person next to you does too. Soon you're all rolling around like helpless, obese bowling balls.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself, as obese and round as a bowling ball, rolling faster and faster down hills. Other people are rolling around you too. You're all screaming. You want the moon to face the other direction so it will stop. You don't like being a human bowling ball!
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the way (方) of some body parts (⺼) is to become obese
humanum_full_description_en:
From " meat " to " fang " sound. The original meaning is fat. "Said Wen": "Fat, fat. From meat, Fangsheng." "Jade chapter. Meat Department: "Fat, fat also." Such as "Tai Xuan. Stove": "The fat beef is fat, and it is cooked without being cooked in the cauldron." Fan Wang noted: "If you take fat meat now, you must use it as a bath and a cauldron to cook it." means cooking. If you do not clean the utensils before beef fat, you will have nausea. Another example is "Qi Min Yao Shu. As 𦞤Ao Lao Bao": "The meat is cooked and the moisture is exhausted, and the meat is cooked with the fat."

" Fat " specifically refers to the fat in the waist. Such as "Selected Works. Emperor Wei Wen "Book with Zhong Dali": "Stealing a jade book is called beautiful jade, white as fat." Li Shan quoted "Popular Wen" as saying: "The fat is in the waist and it is fat."
humanum_short_description_en: From " meat " to " fang " sound. The original meaning is fat, but also specifically refers to the waist fat.
humanum_full_description:
從「肉」，「方」聲。本義是脂肪。《說文》：「肪，肥也。从肉，方聲。」《玉篇．肉部》：「肪，脂肪也。」如《太玄．竈》：「脂牛正肪，不濯釜而烹，敗歐歍之疾至。」范望注：「今以脂肪之肉，必當澡濯釜鼎以煮渫之。」意謂烹煮牛脂肪之肉前，如果不清洗器具，就會有噁心之疾。又如《齊民要術．作𦞤奧糟苞》：「肉熟，水氣盡，更以向所炒肪膏煮肉。」

　　「肪」又特指腰部的脂肪。如《文選．魏文帝〈與鍾大理書〉》：「竊見玉書稱美玉，白如截肪。」李善注引《通俗文》曰：「脂在腰曰肪。」
humanum_short_description: 從「肉」，「方」聲。本義是脂肪，又特指腰部的脂肪。

脂肪(しぼう): fat, grease, blubber

從「 肉 」，「 方 」聲。本義是脂肪。《說文》：「肪，肥也。从肉，方聲。」《玉篇．肉部》：「肪，脂肪也。」如《太玄．竈》：「脂牛正肪，不濯釜而烹，敗歐歍之疾至。」范望注：「今以脂肪之肉，必當澡濯釜鼎以煮渫之。」意謂烹煮牛脂肪之肉前，如果不清洗器具，就會有噁心之疾。又如《齊民要術．作𦞤奧糟苞》：「肉熟，水氣盡，更以向所炒肪膏煮肉。」 「 肪 」又特指腰部的脂肪。如《文選．魏文帝〈與鍾大理書〉》：「竊見玉書稱美玉，白如截肪。」李善注引《通俗文》曰：「脂在腰曰肪。」
From " meat" to " fang" sound. The original meaning is fat. "Said Wen": "Fat, fat. From meat, Fangsheng." "Jade chapter. Meat Department: "Fat, fat also." Such as "Tai Xuan. Stove": "The fat beef is fat, and it is cooked without being cooked in the cauldron." Fan Wang noted: "If you take fat meat now, you must use it as a bath and a cauldron to cook it." means cooking. If you do not clean the utensils before beef fat, you will have nausea. Another example is "Qi Min Yao Shu. As 𦞤Ao Lao Bao": "The meat is cooked and the moisture is exhausted, and the meat is cooked with the fat." " Fat" specifically refers to the fat in the waist. Such as "Selected Works. Emperor Wei Wen "Book with Zhong Dali": "Stealing a jade book is called beautiful jade, white as fat." Li Shan quoted "Popular Wen" as saying: "The fat is in the waist and it is fat."

合,加热后能合而为一。本义是动物的脂肪。特指腰部的脂肪。

Месяц (мясо) означает, что шрифт печати подобен куску мяса, что означает густой жир в мясе животных; квадрат (ang) означает, что квадрат имеет значение союза и единства, что означает, что жир легко сливаться друг с другом и сливаться, а после нагрева может сливаться в одно.
Первоначальное значение - животный жир.

только в сочетаниях 脂肪
Radicals: 月, 方  (moon, direction)
Meaning Mnemonic
When the moon faces the right direction, everyone on earth becomes obese. The pull of the moon moves all the water on earth as well as inside us, so when it faces the right way, we all get super fat.
Picture the moon turning to face a different direction. Feel your body start to become really obese. You get huge and round just like the moon.
Reading Mnemonic
You look around and everyone is obese like you. You try to reach out to them, but you roll over like a big bowling (ぼう) ball. The person next to you does too. Soon you're all rolling around like helpless, obese bowling balls.
Picture yourself, as obese and round as a bowling ball, rolling faster and faster down hills. Other people are rolling around you too. You're all screaming. You want the moon to face the other direction so it will stop. You don't like being a human bowling ball!
